company_description: Lendable is a technology-driven lending platform that provides personal loans and financing solutions to consumers, leveraging data analytics and automation to streamline the lending process.
founders: Jakob Schwarz, Martin Kissinger, Paul Pamment, Victoria van Lennep
embedding_text: Lendable is a technology-driven lending platform that provides personal loans and financing solutions to consumers, leveraging data analytics and automation to streamline the lending process.
